originalText.text:
Dr Evan and his team were truly superlative. My daughter has unfortunately visited many dentists in her seven years, no one has come close to this team!

The medical care is outstanding. Gentle, skilled, compassionate and with clear communication.
The team is so knowledgeable about insurance plans and makes the chaos of the process seem easy and straightforward.
And making appointments even in urgent situations was so patient friendly.

We are so lucky to have found this practice and will never go anywhere else.

Thank you!!!

originalText.text: Treehouse was recommended by a family friend and they did not disappoint. The entire experience from check in to check out was wonderful; smooth and efficient, friendly, and tailored to the needs of a child. My son is unpredictable and while he was always happy to go to treehouse, he didn’t always want someone inspecting his mouth! The staff handled each visit with so much patience and were always able to coax him into complying while also keeping him calm and happy. I wish we could pack this office up and bring it with us on our out of state move! Cannot imagine finding a better dental practice and am sad to have to begin our search somewhere new! Thank you Treehouse for being the best first dental experience or my son- you set the bar high!

originalText.text: Dr. Evans is professional and personable. He remembers his patients and a lot of our friends also highly recommend Tree House. He has been my 5 yr old's first and only dentist. Thanks to this practice, my daughter thinks going to the dentist is one of the most fun activities ever. Before our first ever appointment, the front desk employee recommended showing Daniel Tiger Goes to the Dentist as preparation- what a brilliant idea and kind gesture. The staff are so friendly and the office is so clean.

originalText.text: Fantastic care and treatment for my 8 year old daughter who came away very relaxed and calm. Thank you for such a positive and gentle experience! We will be back!

text.text: Fantastic care and treatment for my 8 year old daughter who came away very relaxed and calm. Thank you for such a positive and gentle experience! We will be back!

originalText.text: I went to this office and the office and doctors are very nice, however, I got a treatment plan to replace a crown and it was 1200 USD. I then happened to move downtown and got the crown replaced at another dentist, and they charged me only 503 USD!!! So I must now believe that this dentist is a bit of a rip-off.
